Text:
Thanks a lot :)
waiting for inversion & Prototype 2.
The Kaos installer gives me a black kind window! No way to install. thanks anyway

Step-1:-------[ UnRAR Yourself Or Use Our Install.exe ]- 

errr unrar it yourself maybe???

i unrared manualy, then i got KaOs.part01.pak - part10

and what now?, if i use install.exe i got a black insataller nothing else!

Step-2:-------[ Run ~Unpack~.bat As Administrator
                To Unpack/Rebuild ]- 
              ( Our Install.exe Does This Step For You ) 

run or click ~unpack~.bat
usually kaos stuf works fine but this doenst seem to work

Game needs:                                                            

  Microsoft .NET Framework 2.0                                            
  Microsoft XNA Framework Redistributable 3.1                            

was missed out of the nfo.

I was having trouble too.
then installed Microsoft XNA Framework Redistributable 3.1.
now working great. :)
@gansuk eagerly waiting for Inversion & Prototype 2 Kaos RIP.
thanks for the game but any solution for rebuild the keys
IT works! Now i hope this game is as good at it looks :)
the game is good. its action packed and is a very good way to kill some time :)
Are you doing ORCS MUT DIE 2?
Just extracts a bunch of empty folders
no need to extract. just run the Install.exe and follow the instructions.
works like a charm after installing Microsoft XNA Framework Redistributable 3.1
